prompt:
What are some tips for improving your writing skills? Please provide examples or resources when possible.
I am an amateur writer who would like to improve my skills significantly. I have heard about various techniques such as practicing regularly, reading widely, joining a writing workshop etc. but I would love to hear more about this subject from you! If there are any specific resources (books, websites, blogs) or exercises that you would recommend for improving my writing skills, please share them with me!
